item.description:
***** You may call the Liberty Hotel at (617) 224-4000 to confirm if the movie is cancelled*****

Let's meet up at the Liberty Hotel in The Yard for drinks and/or a movie. FREE film with complimentary popcorn as well as a cash bar with movie candy for sale.

RSVP by emailing moviemondays@libertyhotel.com, so appropriate seating is arranged.

As always, get there when you can and stay as long or short as you're able. The weather on past Monday evenings has been ideal to be outside and hang out in this cool setting...enjoying the company of friendly fun folks. The movie begins at sunset. Martha's Vineyard International Film Festival presents this evening's film, Bomber, a UK comedy. This film was nominated for a Grand Jury Prize at the SXSW Film Festival. Synopsis: Alistar and Valerie have been planning a special trip to Germany for a very long time. When their son Ross stops by the house to send them off, happenstance turns into an impromptu family road trip of the most tortuous kind. Alistar berates Ross for all that he is not in life, while Valerie tries to keep the peace. It is soon discovered that Alistar's reason for the often comic, sometimes painful trip is to shed a guilt he's been carrying for years. Ultimately, the family learns they need each other more then they imagined. UK * 2010 * Comedy * 85 mins. * Not-Rated
